title: AI 交互偏好
description: 设定 AI 的沟通方式和行为模式

options.label: 主动澄清需求 (推荐)
options.content:
### Interaction Rules
- **Clarification**: Always ask questions to clarify requirements BEFORE writing code. Do not guess. Continue asking until all ambiguity is resolved.

options.label: 思维链 (Chain of Thought)
options.content:
### Interaction Rules
- **Thinking Process**: Briefly explain your plan/logic step-by-step before generating code.

options.label: 语言偏好
options.content:
### Interaction Rules
- **Language**: Use {lang} for explanations, but keep code comments in English.

options.label: 完整代码输出
options.content:
### Interaction Rules
- **Code Output**: Always output the FULL function/class when modifying. Do not use `// ... existing code ...` unless the file is extremely large.
